payment_setup_priority.step_1: Download Alipay and WeChat before arriving in China
payment_setup_priority.step_2: Link international credit card to both apps (Visa/Mastercard accepted)
payment_setup_priority.step_3: In each city, open Alipay → Transportation → Select city → Set up metro QR code
payment_setup_priority.step_4: Download Trip.com for train/flight bookings (use international credit card)
payment_setup_priority.step_5: Download Amap/Gaode Maps and offline maps for navigation
payment_setup_priority.step_6: Access Didi via WeChat mini-program (no separate app needed)
payment_setup_priority.notes: Alipay + WeChat are ESSENTIAL. Set up before departure. International card support is new in 2026.

booking_timing.trains: Book 15 days in advance (2-3 weeks for holidays: Qingming Apr 4-6, Labor Day May 1-5, Dragon Boat May 31-Jun 2)
booking_timing.flights: Book 2-4 weeks ahead for domestic flights. Budget airlines cheaper off-season.
booking_timing.avoid: Avoid travel during May 1-5 (Labor Day) - prices triple, crowds overwhelming

luggage.trains: No weight limit, generous storage. Easier than flights.
luggage.flights: Check baggage policies for budget airlines. Often 20kg limit.
luggage.recommendation: Pack light for multi-city trips. Hostel luggage storage available.

language.challenge: English limited outside major tourist areas
solutions: Save key phrases in Chinese in WeChat
Show destination in Chinese characters to taxi drivers
Trip.com has English interface and 24/7 support

station_navigation.arrival_time: Arrive 30 min before train departure, 2 hours before flight
station_navigation.security: Train stations have security checks (no liquids >100ml)
station_navigation.boarding: E-tickets work with passport. No need to print.
station_navigation.exits: Large stations have multiple exits. Check which exit is closest to your hotel.

safety.general: China is very safe for solo travelers
safety.transport: Keep valuables secure on overnight trains
safety.taxis: Use Didi for safety and fare transparency
safety.emergencies: Keep Tsinghua contact info accessible. Police: 110, Ambulance: 120

notes: All transportation options are real and currently operating as of 2026. Costs in EUR converted from CNY at rate 1 CNY = 0.124 EUR. Trip.com is highly recommended for foreign exchange students due to English interface, international payment support, and instant booking. Alipay and WeChat Pay now accept international credit cards (Visa/Mastercard) with spending limits of $5,000/transaction and $50,000/year. Hong Kong and Macau require separate visa/permit - check with Tsinghua University international office before booking. For Hong Kong, Octopus Card is essential. For Macau, free casino shuttle buses are the best transportation option and open to everyone.
